mapper.select: select count(*) from user where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, email, phone, address) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.select: select id, username, email, phone, address from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update user set password=#{password}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address} where id = #{id}
